name: Dril - english effectively
description: Dril is an application for learning not only English words and phrases. The application is based on a method of repetition, which is an effective way of remembering vocabulary and other various information.    Features: - Creating your own textbooks, lesson, vocabulary - Synchronization with web.drilapp.com - XLS, CSV, WEB imports of vocabulary - Backups & Restores - Works off-line - Pronunciation - Simple statistics - Is FREE and no Ads! - And many more features!
